string.name: text
string.value: My dearest Stump,\r \rThe pain! Oh, the pain! I can't stand the pain of being away from you another moment! I need to feel your rough bark against my skin. I need to smell your thick, pine-fresh scent around me. Nothing can put out the flame I have for you... but I won't burn you! Promise!

string.name: text
string.value: My fuzzy little Lupin,\r \rEver since we shared that first banana, you've been monkeying around in my thoughts. I've gone ape for you, my charming capuchin. I've got a barrel full of kisses for you the next time we're together!

string.name: text
string.value: My mysterious Specter,\r \rYou're everything I've ever wanted: Tall, dark, and handsome. I can't keep your haunting voice off my mind. I even wake up with chills just thinking about you! Isn't it spooky how good we are together?

string.name: text
string.value: My peppy Pepe,\r \rI was so impressed the first time we met! Seeing you all dressed up in your little tuxedo melted the ice around my heart. I'd waddle with you anywhere, and share a fish or two under the moonlight. Call me.

string.name: text
string.value: My big, strong Yeti,\r \rYou're the beast I never knew I needed. Strong enough to rely on, and soft enough to relax with. Can I be your beauty? Just ditch that little penguin that's always hanging around you and we can keep each other warm on the icy slopes.
